溯る: (さかのぼる) - to go upstream; to go back (in time, to origin)/to date back to/to trace back to/to make retroactive
溯河魚: (さっかぎょ) - anadromous fish (fish that migrates upstream, e.g. salmon)
溯源: (そげん) - returning to the origin; going back to the beginning; retracing
溯航: (そこう) - going upstream; sailing against the current
溲瓶: (しゅびん) - urine bottle; (urinary) bedpan; chamber pot (esp. medical); urinal
溶々: (ようよう) - vast; overflowing with water; spacious
溶きほぐす: (ときほぐす) - to whip an egg; to scramble (e.g. an egg)
溶く: (とく) - to dissolve (paint); to scramble (eggs); to melt (metal, etc.); to mix (water with flour, etc.)
溶けこむ: (とけこむ) - to melt into/to merge into; to fit in/to adapt/to blend
溶け出す: (とけだす) - to begin to dissolve
溶け込み: (とけこみ) - integration (e.g. social); mixing; penetration
溶け込む: (とけこむ) - to melt into/to merge into; to fit in/to adapt/to blend
溶剤: (ようざい) - solvent/solution/flux; (溶材 only) hot charge
溶原菌: (ようげんきん) - lysogen; bacteria carrying a prophage
溶岩トンネル: (ようがんトンネル) - lava tunnel
溶岩円頂丘: (ようがんえんちょうきゅう) - lava dome
溶岩尖塔: (ようがんせんとう) - lava spine
溶岩洞穴: (ようがんほらあな) - lava cave
溶接部: (ようせつぶ) - weld; weld zone; welded part
溶材: (ようざい) - solvent/solution/flux; (溶材 only) hot charge
溶溶: (ようよう) - vast; overflowing with water; spacious
溶融型熱転写プリンタ: (ようゆうがたねつてんしゃプリンタ) - phase change printer
溶血性尿毒症症候群: (ようけつせいにょうどくしょうしょうこうぐん) - hemolytic-uremic syndrome; HUS
溶血性貧血: (ようけつせいひんけつ) - hemolytic anemia
溶血性連鎖球菌: (ようけつせいれんさきゅうきん) - hemolytic streptococcus
溶解: (ようかい) - (溶解 only) dissolution/dissolving/solution (e.g. chemical); melting/liquefying/fusion
溶解力: (ようかいりょく) - solubility; solvent power
溶込む: (とけこむ) - to melt into/to merge into; to fit in/to adapt/to blend
溶連菌感染症: (ようれんきんかんせんしょう) - hemolytic streptococcal infection (haemolytic)
溶鉱炉: (ようこうろ) - smelting furnace; blast furnace
溷濁: (こんだく) - turbidity/cloudiness (of a liquid)/opacity/muddiness (e.g. water, mind, consciousness); disorder/chaos
溺らす: (おぼらす) - to drown; to cause to be indulged or addicted
溺れる: (oboreru) - se afogar, quase se afogar, afundar abaixo da superfície (da água); se entregar a, perder a cabeça por algo, se deleitar em
溺れる者は藁をも掴む: (おぼれるものはわらをもつかむ) - (proverb) A drowning man will catch at a straw
溺れ損なう: (おぼれそこなう) - to come near being drowned
溺れ死ぬ: (おぼれじぬ) - to die by drowning; to drown
溺れ込む: (おぼれこむ) - to drown; to get addicted; to become infatuated
滂沱: (ぼうだ) - floods of tears, sweat, etc.
滂湃: (ほうはい) - as the sound of surging water; vigorous/surging/welling
滄浪: (そうろう) - blue waves/blue wave; hair that has lost its shine due to ageing
滄海一滴: (そうかいいってき) - (yoji) a drop in the ocean (bucket)
滄海桑田: (そうかいそうでん) - (yoji) The word is a scene of constant changes (as the blue sea changing into a mulberry field). (Chinese legend)
滄溟: (そうめい) - great blue sea; ocean
滅する: (めっする) - to be destroyed/to perish/to go out (e.g. fire); to destroy/to get rid of/to extinguish
